attributes.action: increase tax on cigarettes to pay for dry cleaning and roadside cleaners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I propose that the government whack on an extra £1 in tax on each packet of cigarettes, to pay for Government-subsidised dry cleaning tickets for those of us who have to suffer smelly clothes when in the company of puffers (and I'm not just talking about in enclosed public spaces).

A second £1 could be imposed to pay for street cleaners with little vacuum cleaners to suck up the butts which smokers selfishly chuck on the floor - another aspect of this filthy, disgusting habit.

There should be VERY HEAVY fines for those who insist on exercising their God-given right to make our streets look like the proverbial rubbish dump.
